Plot: A dramatic retelling of the post-Watergate television interviews between British talk-show host David Frost and former president Richard Nixon.
Title: Frost/Nixon
Actors: Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Sam Rockwell, Kevin Bacon
tomatoConsensus: Frost/Nixon is weighty and eloquent; a cross between a boxing match and a ballet with Oscar worthy performances.
Awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 21 wins & 72 nominations.
